Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com ~wlahti Can you determine if this appears to be a problem with peer API or SDK?

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: Please provide the chaincode name that was used to cause this issue, Thanks.

Action.author: nekia
Action.body: mycc|https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-samples/tree/release-1.2/chaincode/chaincode_example02/go ( used in first-network/byfn.sh ) andÂ marblesp|https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-samples/tree/release-1.2/chaincode/marbles02_private ( used in private data collection tutorial )

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: I've found that this is a dup of FAB-11039, which is fixed in v1.3 already, and is being proposed to backport to a future v1.2.2.
